content:
Principles of Data Mining: Draft Chapters for ICS 278 use ONLY

Data Mining Algorithms

  • Chapter 9: Descriptive Modeling and Clustering (Required Reading)
    PDF, 2-page PDF, Postscript, 2-page Postscript
    Required Reading in Chapter 9
    • Section 9.1
    • Section 9.2 on distribution and density models (SubSection 9.2.5 on EM is optional)
    • Section 9.3 on cluster analysis
    • Section 9.4 on partitional clustering (SubSection 9.4.1 on Score Functions is optional)
    • Section 9.5 on hierarchical clustering
    • Section 9.6 on probabilistic clustering

  • Chapter 10: Predictive Modeling: Classification (Required Reading)
    PDF, 2-page PDF, Postscript, 2-page Postscript
    Required Reading in Chapter 10
    • The entire chapter should be read with specific focus on the topics we discussed in class.

  • Chapter 11: Predictive Modeling: Regression (Optional)
    Postscript, 2-page Postscript

  • Chapter 12: Data Management and Databases (Optional)
    Postscript, 2-page Postscript

  • Chapter 13: Finding Rules and Patterns (Optional)
    Postscript, 2-page Postscript

  • Chapter 14: Retrieval by Content (Required Reading)
    PDF, 2-page PDF, Postscript, 2-page Postscript
    Required Reading in Chapter 14 (to be read before class on Tuesday November 30th)
    • 14.1 Introduction
    • 14.2 Evaluation
    • 14.3 Text Retrieval
    • 14.4 Image Retrieval
    • 14.6 Summary
